question: On Monday, Noah wants to exercise for four times the amount of time he did on Sunday and Saturday combined. On Saturday he exercised for 17 minutes. On Sunday he exercised for 13 minutes. How many minutes does he have to exercise on Monday to reach his goal?
answer:
On Saturday and Sunday he exercised a total of 30 minutes because 17 + 13 = <<17+13=30>>30
On Monday he has to exercise for 120 minutes because 30*4 = <<30*4=120>>120
#### 120
